programme.title: Dramatic stage wrap-up decides team elimination
programme.desc: The Double Round Robin stage wraps up with dramatic sailing races as the last team faces elimination.

programme.title: Alinghi Red Bull Racing's bid to reach the final
programme.desc: INEOS Britannia faces Alinghi Red Bull Racing in the semi-finals, racing to five points to reach the final.

programme.title: Luna Rossa and American Magic: Revenge on the line
programme.desc: American Magic takes on Luna Rossa in the semi-finals, with five points deciding the finalist.

programme.title: Braving difficult weather in the race to the final
programme.desc: Fierce competition awaits in the Louis Vuitton Cup semi-finals, with teams just one win away from the final.

programme.title: Future sailing stars take on Youth America’s Cup
programme.desc: Unicredit Youth America’s Cup 2024 brings 12 foiling prodigy teams to Barcelona, battling in fast AC40 boats.

programme.title: Racing action from the Challenger Series Finale
programme.desc: INEOS Britannia and Luna Rossa Prada Pirelli clash in the Louis Vuitton Challenger Series Finale.

programme.title: INEOS vs Luna Rossa race for a spot in the final
programme.desc: Luna Rossa Prada Pirelli attempts a comeback after an incident for a spot in the 37th America's Cup final.

programme.title: The first-ever Women's America's Cup
programme.desc: For the first time, female sailors compete in their own category for the Women's America's Cup.

programme.title: Kicking off in Barcelona
programme.desc: The world's oldest global sports competition still running kicks off in Barcelona for the 37th America’s Cup.

programme.title: Crowning the 37th America's Cup winner
programme.desc: The 37th America’s Cup finale unfolds as INEOS Britannia and Emirates Team New Zealand sail for the crown.

programme.title: ANYTIME
programme.desc: Follow a new generation of mountain bikers conquering extreme terrain in ANYTIME.

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Map the extraordinary rise of Mondo Duplantis from backyard dreamer to global pole vault sensation.

programme.title: Jaan Roose: Life on the Line
programme.desc: Slackliner Jaan Roose reflects on life as he plans a world record tightrope walk across the Strait of Messina.

programme.title: ABC of... Rally Raid
programme.desc: Find out what it takes to compete in one of the most arduous races on the planet.

programme.title: Hope
programme.desc: After a devastating injury, Marc Márquez's biggest challenge is to be what he once was, so he moves to Madrid.

programme.title: Talent
programme.desc: Marc’s riding style has earned him admiration from fans, but has also led to conflicts with other riders.

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: Marc remembers his early MotoGP™ times and meets up with the man who was his idol back then: Valentino Rossi.

programme.title: Passion
programme.desc: Marc recovers from surgery with one goal: to win again. In Austria he meets his former rival, Dani Pedrosa.

programme.title: Comeback
programme.desc: It’s time for Marc to recap on a year that's seen him make some of the most difficult decisions of his life.

programme.title: Pérez's Nevada night out
programme.desc: What happens in Vegas doesn’t always stay in Vegas. Relive an epic night with Formula One driver Sergio Pérez.

programme.title: The Next Centimeter
programme.desc: Discover what it takes for pole vaulter Armand ‘Mondo’ Duplantis to raise the bar – one centimetre at a time.

programme.title: Portland, USA
programme.desc: The influence of past winners is evident as a new generation of homemade flying machines takes to the skies.

programme.title: Oslo, Norway
programme.desc: Local flavours rule the day, as teams dress up homemade flying machines in honour of food, festivals and more.

programme.title: Varna, Bulgaria
programme.desc: A crowd of 20,000 welcomes teams of amateur aviators who will attempt to fly on the coast of the Black Sea.

programme.title: (Un)credited
programme.desc: Dive deep into the origins of Afro Dance in Nigeria and how it has shaped a global mainstream culture.
